question: India's first Pulse Bio Park has been proposed to be set up in which state?
explanation: The M.S. Swaminathan Research Foundation (MSSRF), Chennai, with the help of Government of India has planned to set up a Pulse Bio Park in Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu. It would be similar to Rice Bio Park at Nay Pyi Taw in Myanmar. It will help to enhance the income of farmers involved in the cultivation of pulses.
